name: City Climb Prado Car Stunt Parking Simulator 3D
name_original: City Climb Prado Car Stunt Parking Simulator 3D
description:
Do you love parking games with prado that is full of adventure? overcome your parking madness by playing new prado car driving and parking game of 2017. Luxury Prado Adventure Parking is a free offline rooftop jumping and parking simulation game that is a addictive and fun 3D game dedicated to all the fans who love multi-storey parking and escalade driving games in modern city! with luxury multi level parking sim 3D it's time for extreme driving adventure on multi-story buildings rooftops by Climbing up and climbing down to park into the challenging parking lots.you will get the real Escalade simulator 4x4 SUV experience.become crazy Prado car climb driver with Luxury prado 4x4 driving.in prado car parking you will learn how to master in parking your vehicles parallel. you can easily park the prado car on rooftops and skyscraper of modern city if you already have an driving experience of climb hill and steep mountains.

Parking vehicles is a challenging part of driving. Become a legend among the monster prado legends and start driving on offroads in the new york city. discover real interesting features by driving crazy prado on offroad ramps and become real parking legend with parking mania. drive thrilling toyota cars with backyard parking simulator and grab an extreme crazy road trip that is full of prado parking adventure of 2017. Enjoy the new Prado jeep driving game of 2017. experience the thrill of driving amazing SUV s that includes high speed monster jeeps and land cruiser Prados. if you have to love driving expensive valley jeep & pr-ado cars and large Toyota making some parking and driving than its right time to play this thrilling simulation drive fruntrunner game. embrace high speed. take control of fast speed valley jeep on rooftops while climb the wall at some points you need roof jumping to complete levels.

City Climb Prado Parking 3D features:

Shift the gear to forward or backward as you need
Different Parking levels with parking hurdles in the modern city
Extreme Prado car driving experience
Realistic 3D city rooftop graphics for car parking real mania
5 different modern prado cars for driving
Real engine sounds
4 different cam angle.(Rotating,Top,Back,Front)
Realistic steering wheel ( Each wheel is designed special for unique driving experience. Every car has different parking skills.)
Perfect car physics and car simulation

Enjoy Luxury Prado Stunt Parking 3D game of 2017!
